sub_title: Developing International, Sustainable and Climate smart Value Chains in Agriculture and Agroforestry
summary: Sophieke is specialised in international, sustainable and climate smart value chains in agriculture and agroforestry. She acknowledges the position of stakeholders as actor, influencer or supporter. Sophieke knows that sustainability includes environmental, financial, social and institutional aspects. CO2 reduction and carbon sequestration has become urgent. As member of Supervisory Boards Sophieke contributes to financial analysis and risk assessment for the development of future scenarios.
